translations: 通风，通风系统；（医）（尤指人工）给肺提供空气；（对意见、问题、抱怨等的）公开讨论（或调查）

phrs.headword: ventilation equip we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao

phrs.translation: 对流通风，穿堂风；交叉通风
肺通气；肺通气量；肺换气

sentences.sentence: “Tiny amounts” of radioactive material had escaped into the air during the ventilations, Mr Edano said.
sentences.translation: 枝野幸男说，有“微量”的放射性物质随着蒸汽被排放至大气中。

sentences.sentence: Objective To investigate the effect of different tidal volume ventilations on the amount of atelectasis during general anesthesia.
sentences.translation: 目的：研究不同潮气量通气对全麻病人肺不张的影响。
